description:
play CrimeCase:Criminal Investigate game which is a hidden object game for criminal. investigate of a crime case is hidden puzzle game through beautiful scenes and challenging puzzles in every case. the secret hidden clues are used to catch the criminal. it will loved by the thousand of the cases games for lovers.
12 case with the different murder mystery, find clues and analyse the criminal


FEATURES :-

-find the hidden object and through the evidence of the crime.
-investigate the murderer through the clues and catch them in a jail
-give punishment to the killer and give justice to the innocent people
-sharing in social media.
